mapper.insert: insert into CupTeam(TEAM_NAME, TEAM_LEADER, TEAM_PHONE, TEAM_MAIL, TEAM_UNIFORM_HOME, TEAM_UNIFORM_AWAY, TEAM_EMBLEM, TEAM_PASSWORD, TEAM_CODE) values(#{teamName}, #{teamLeader}, #{teamPhone}, #{teamMail}, #{teamUniformHome}, #{teamUniformAway}, #{teamEmblem}, #{teamPassWord}, #{teamCode})
